text: As we near the approval of a #COVID19 #vaccine, keep in mind traditional vaccine procurement may not fit a global pandemic. Instead, Eva Marchese, Anthony Barron, Abhishek Kumar, and Kees Chamberlain of @News_CRA write how risk-sharing agreements are key: https://t.co/q0rixLcSDE https://t.co/fYEBuGHNgg
